dmca.title: DMCA Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
[private]
Internet Enforcement Representative 

Monday, August21, 2006 

Via Fax: ([private]. 

Google, Inc. 
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private] 
Mountain View CA 94043 


Re: Infringement Notification for Google 

Dear Sir or Madam: 
I, the undersigned, certify under penalty of perjury that the information contained herein is accurate, and that I am the copyright Owner or agent authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner. Simon & Schuster is the owner of rights in and to the Pimsleur Language Programs. Accordingly, I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described below at the following link is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law: 
http://devgoods.googlepages.com/ 
As the rights owner diligently enforces its rights in all forms of media we hereby demand that you promptly remove the copyrighted materials from your website. We would appreciate written confirmation that you have complied with our request. 
Nothing in this letter shall be construed as a waiver or relinquishment of any right or remedy possessed by the rights owner or any other affected party, all of which are expressly reserved. 

Sincerely
[signed]
[private]
[private]
CBS Law 
[private] 
New York, NY 10019 
[private]
556431 -Yahoo Video DMCA
